Quality Education.reason: The course is fundamentally about higher education, aiming to strengthen students' language skills and provide knowledge of German literature and culture at a college level.
evidence: Through this course, students will have opportunities to get to know German language literature and cultures at a college level first hand.
Taking part in this course will mainly strengthen students’ reading skills, as well as their listening, conversational and writing skills in German language.
Students are also expected to obtain at least the level of B1 according to the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR).

Gender Equality.reason: The course explicitly includes the study of "female authors," ensuring their contributions are recognized alongside their male counterparts in German literary history.
